Detailed Description

Iterates over TwitterStatus items with filtering options.

Currently only supports FilteredIterator::FILTER_REPLIES to filter out "@replies" into a separate panel.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum FilteredIterator::FilterTypes

Represents ways you can filter the results.

Enumerator:
FILTER_NONE  No filter applied.
FILTER_REPLIES  Shows all "@replies" directed to you only.
